text: The 1924-25 Austrian Football Championship in the first league was contested by 11 teams. The First and the Second league were only open to professional football clubs. Other federal state associations organized state championships in different modes on an amateur basis.Austrian football champions became Hakoah from Vienna. They won their first title. The defending champion Wiener Amateur SV was runner-up in the table. Since the I. League was increased to 13 teams the next season , no team was relegated. ==Table== Pl. Name M W D L P 1\. SC Hakoah Wien 20 10 6 4 26 2\. Wiener Amateur SV 20 10 4 6 24 3\. First Vienna FC 20 9 5 6 23 4\. SK Rapid Wien 20 9 5 6 23 5\. Wiener AC 20 8 7 5 23 6\. SK Admira Wien 20 8 6 6 22 7\. SC Wacker Wien 20 6 8 6 20 8\. 1. Simmeringer SC 20 7 4 9 18 9\. Wiener Sport-Club 20 6 5 9 17 10\. SK Slovan Wien 22 5 7 8 17 11\.
